::Prowl/FZ/Kluster/Grimmler/Firearm::

Kluster ducks, ion disks cutting through his shoulder, rendering his 
left arm useless. He sighs. He couldn't take this much longer.

Aiming carefully, he fires two missiles at Manterror.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler dives out of the way of the ion disks, misjudging the 
landing and tripping and falling on his face.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm frowns, looking at the vibrations coming from the main hatch 
of the CF.

"Do you know any other way in?" He asks HotRod, walking up to the 
bot. He knew that asking was useless because Firearm probably knew 
quite a bit more about the CF than Hot Rod did.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ twists out of the way of Angel Prime's sword, growling and letting 
go of Prowl in the proccess. Prowl spinns around, swinging his staff 
at FZ. The staff hits, FZ falling toward the ground, clutching a 
glowing spot on his side. The glow was dissolving his armor, draining 
his energy, and generating a slagload of pain.
